text: Amazed {sender} got too excited about today's weather and gracefully awarded brave {receiver} with a shiny {award} in an envelope! On the back {sender} added: "{attachmentText}".

The stars aligned today, and {sender} somehow managed to make up their mind and appreciate {receiver} with a little gift. To everyone's surprise it was a dusty old {award}. Remembering this event 50 years later {sender} mumbled in awe: "{attachmentText}".
Without too much thought {sender} decided to throw {award} at {receiver}. "{attachmentText}" - {sender} yelled desperately.
